pageContent: Objective: To evaluate a sexual rehabilitation service for men with prostate cancer and to use these results to inform the development of future care.

metaData.source:
Assessment of late urinary, bowel and sexual function after dose escalation from 70 to 76 Gy using image-guided radiotherapy in curative treatment of prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/22352316/
